full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Request for Proposal (RFP) for Target Retrieval Systems

### Contract Information

* **Reference Number**: WS4310769817
* **Publication Date**: December 20, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 17, 2024, at 14:00
* **Amendment Number**: 2

### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

### Goods and Services Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) on behalf of the Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) for the acquisition of two (2) indoor target retrieval systems. The systems must include dismantle and dispose of the two (2) current Target Retrieval Systems and install two (2) new systems, including routine and emergency maintenance and repair services. 

The products must meet specific requirements as detailed in Annex A of this RFP.

### Details of the Contract

* **Trade Agreements**: This RFP is open to bid under the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and other applicable trade agreements.
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Quebec (except National Capital Region)
* **Regions of Delivery**: Quebec (except National Capital Region)
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Melanie Caty, PSPC
* **Contact Email**: [melanie.caty@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:melanie caty@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

To view the full RFP, please visit [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18331551?extsite=MTgzMzE1NTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18331551?extsite=MTgzMzE1NTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
